name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-ui-templates-python
title: Teams UI templates
shortDescription: This sample app provides tested, high-quality UI templates to help developers understand how to create effective applications for Microsoft Teams, covering common use cases like dashboards and forms.
longDescription: The Microsoft Teams UI Templates sample app serves as a comprehensive guide for developers to implement visually appealing and functional applications within Teams. It includes a variety of tested UI templates that cater to common use cases, such as dashboards and forms, ensuring a consistent user experience.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing Teams UI templates using python

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
